title: EC60075: Fibre Optic Technology - Quick Facts
text:
EC60075
Course name | Fibre Optic Technology
Offered by | Electronics & Electrical Communication Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: NoneCommon glasses, optical glasses, optical fibre materials, optical fibre perform making, reaction kinetics and efficiency, instrumentation, perform characterization, fibre fabrication processes, fibre drawing and coating, jacketing and cabling, splicing, fibre parameters and characterizations, wave propagation in fibre, optical sources modulators and detectors.
